class_notes: Instructor permission required to enroll , Synchronous class attendance required
course_description: This course introduces nutrition science knowledge that emphasizes 1) basic biochemical functions and interactions of macronutrients/micronutrients and effect on human physiology, and 2) how nutrition research is used to develop dietary recommendations for individuals and specific populations .
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3360, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: A. Kucelin, Status: Closed
